comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content:
Pic clearly says "mayor" (for a change).

According to "politicalgraveyard.com," there was a William B Thompson who was mayor of Detroit at about this time ('06-'08 and 1910-12).  Don't know if this is he.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Mayor of Detroit in 1907-08, and in 1911-12.
